CIPHER.269.cipherString: It Is the last rose of summer Left blooming alone; All her lovely companions Are faded and gone.
CIPHER.269.question: A quote by Thomas Moore has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.269.author: Thomas Moore

CIPHER.248.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 53761 5478 89372 03471. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.250.cipherString: Remember that the most beautiful things in the world are the most useless; peacocks and lilies for instance.
CIPHER.250.question: A quote by John Ruskin has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.250.author: John Ruskin

CIPHER.263.cipherString: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
CIPHER.263.question: The following quote by Hippocrates needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MAINE and polybius key of MAGNITUDE.
CIPHER.263.author: Hippocrates

CIPHER.262.cipherString: Only those who look with the eyes of children can lose themselves in the object of their wonder.
CIPHER.262.question: A quote by Eberhard Arnold has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it starts with the word ONLY.
CIPHER.262.author: Eberhard Arnold

CIPHER.261.cipherString: A zebra does not change its spots.
CIPHER.261.question: The following quote by Al Gore needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=19 and b=3.
CIPHER.261.author: Al Gore

CIPHER.256.cipherString: It never seems to occur to some people, that, like beauty, a sense of humor may sometimes be fatal.
CIPHER.256.question: A quote by Edgar Rice Burroghs has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.256.author: Edgar Rice Burroghs

CIPHER.260.cipherString: Leaders live by choice, not by accident.
CIPHER.260.question: The following strange phrases encode a quote by Mark Gorman using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the cipher text AMAZE FIERY AGING HAIRY COBRA decodes to be BYACC
CIPHER.260.author: Mark Gorman

CIPHER.267.cipherString: When you encounter difficulties and contradictions, do not try to break them, but bend them with gentleness and time.
CIPHER.267.question: A quote by Saint Francis de Sales has been encoded using the K2 Patristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it starts with WHEN Y.
CIPHER.267.author: Saint Francis de Sales

CIPHER.247.cipherString: It feels awfully nice to be a little kinder to yourself and everybody else.
CIPHER.247.question: The following quote by Sarah Hays Coomer needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of BLANKET
CIPHER.247.author: Sarah Hays Coomer

CIPHER.266.cipherString: Breakthroughs arise when someone can combine many ideas together. Think broadly, not deeply.
CIPHER.266.question: A quote by Joshua Krook has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word CAN.
CIPHER.266.author: Joshua Krook

CIPHER.265.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 450 6125 619 82337. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.264.cipherString: aye enver regrte naything. Ebcause every littlle detail fo yoru ilfe si what made ewe into who yew are in the end.
CIPHER.264.question: Decode a quote by Drew Barrymore has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher.  Unfortunately the message was received over a bad connection, so there are some errors in it.
CIPHER.264.author: Drew Barrymore

CIPHER.253.cipherString: One must never look for happiness: one meets it by the way.
CIPHER.253.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Isabelle Eberhardt using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.253.author: Isabelle Eberhardt

CIPHER.258.cipherString: An expert is an ordinary person who consistently sought knowledge in a specific field and applied it.
CIPHER.258.question: A quote by Gift Gugu Mona has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.258.author: Gift Gugu Mona

CIPHER.249.cipherString: When you set your mind to achieve something, you must allow yourself the opportunity to get it done.
CIPHER.249.question: Decode this quote by Tasha Hoggatt which has been encoded using the Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.249.author: Tasha Hoggatt

CIPHER.252.cipherString: Failure is when you give up. A real winner is someone that doesn't give up, even when it feels like they are losing.
CIPHER.252.question: A quote by Joshua Hartzell has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word YOU.
CIPHER.252.author: Joshua Hartzell

CIPHER.259.cipherString: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
CIPHER.259.question: The following quote by Dalai Lama needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of JOKES and polybius key of PUBLISHED.
CIPHER.259.author: Dalai Lama

CIPHER.268.cipherString: El éxito no es permanente y la derrota no es fatal; lo que cuenta es el coraje para continuar.
CIPHER.268.question: A quote by an unknown person in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.268.author: Unknown
CIPHER.268.translation: Success is not permanent and defeat is not fatal; what counts is the courage to continue.

CIPHER.257.cipherString: Try not to have a good time... this is supposed to be educational.
CIPHER.257.question: A quote by Charles M. Schulz has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has TO HAVE in it corresponding to the encoded text X L Y D T R S G, meaning D = ●●●; G = ●××; L = –––; R = ×●●; S = ●–×; T = ×●–; X = ×–×; Y = ××●.
CIPHER.257.author: Charles M. Schulz

CIPHER.254.cipherString: You take people, you put them on a journey, you give them peril, you find out who they really are.
CIPHER.254.question: A quote by Joss Whedon has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it ends with the word ARE.
CIPHER.254.author: Joss Whedon

CIPHER.246.cipherString: Failures are with heroic minds the stepping-stones to success.
CIPHER.246.question: A quote by Haliburton has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has ONESTO somewhere in it.
CIPHER.246.author: Haliburton

CIPHER.251.cipherString: Wisdom oft times consists of knowing what to do next.
CIPHER.251.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Herbert Hoover using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.251.author: Herbert Hoover

CIPHER.255.cipherString: Oh! breathe not his name, let it sleep in the shade, Where cold and unhonoured his relics are laid.
CIPHER.255.question: Decode this quote by Thomas Moore which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.255.author: Thomas Moore
